column4: can't find system/administrator/boot in my desktop menu.  its the boot part I didn't find.  umm..
where in the ubuntu gnome desktop will I find a spot to edit the boot?
did you install grub in mbr ?
so your menu.lst corresponds with uname -r ?
it tells you what kernelversion you are running
if  sudo /sbin/grub-install /dev/hda does not work you might have to reinstall ubuntu
